title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: The New Package Wizard in the Java Project is displaying a confusing message (1GD0L9O) when creating a new package. This message needs to be clarified for better user understanding.
OB: When creating a new package in the Java Project, the New Package Wizard displays a confusing message.
EB: When creating a new package in the Java Project, the New Package Wizard should display a clear and understandable message.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new Java Project.
2. Select the created project in the project explorer.
3. Attempt to create a new package.
